data.title: California Cannabis Equity Grants Program Provides $15 Million in Grant Funding for Local Jurisdictions
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: Funding advances economic justice for communities disproportionately impacted by cannabis prohibition   Sacramento, CA – The Governor’s Office of Business and Economic Development (GO-Biz), in partnership with the Bureau of Cannabis Control, today announced $15 million in grant funding through the Cannabis Equity Grants Program for Local Jurisdictions. This program seeks to advance economic justice […]
tags: California Governor's Office of Business and Economic Development (GO-Biz)
